name: Find the Dot
description:
Can you find the dot? Yes? Congratulations you are good at not being blind :) But how good?

Try to spot the dot of a different color as quickly as possible to reach higher score. At first you start with 30 seconds. For each correct touch your earn 3 seconds (up to 25 seconds), for bad touch you lose 3 seconds and therefore score.

Share your score with friends.

Features:

  • Eye-candy graphics
  • Challenging gameplay

    • Good luck and have fun!

    Music by Ville Nousiainen

    http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto
